author: psmith
msg: removed dependancy on DefaultSortTableModel, now can use any
impl of EventContainer

author: psmith
msg: More refactoring of DefaultSortableTableModel.
Moved out some static inner classes to top level classes so they can
be shared with other implementations of EventContainer.
Added an AbstractChainsawTableModel plus a shell impl of
ChainsawCyclicBufferTableModel.
Have tested a bit that this hasn't broken anything by loading events
from an XML file, and doing some basic filtering etc, and it seems
to be ok, but keep an eye out...

author: sdeboy
msg: Scrolls to top of detail pane now when scrolltobottom is on or you select an event with the keyboard.

author: psmith
msg: fixed a bug where the clearModel method wasn't using the model's
clear method, and the events weren't, well, getting cleared!

author: psmith
msg: modified so new string buffer created each time.  This is ONLY because
of a known JDK 1.4.1-ish issue where there was a Memory leak,
it's safe enough to just reallocate another buffer.
Also made sure the notifying of Listeners about the event count is
down without holding the synchronze lock, this would effectively be
an Open call.  Much much safer to releaes the lock and notify, even if
that means that by the time the listeners get notified the details are bit
old.
